text: - I am Claudio Alberti,
I am a CTO and co-founder of Genomsys.

Our software help doctors
to use genomic information

to take the best decision and
diagnosis for their patients.

All our software is
based on impact MPEG-G,
the MP3 for genomic data.

In our vision to enable large
scale genomics for everyone,
the collaboration with AWS was strategic,

because AWS enabled us to
build a real, scalable,

reliable, and global
solution for our customers.
So genomic data storage
and handling is a very sensitive topic.

We made sure to implement
security in the cloud,

while AWS took care of
security off the cloud.
For Genomsys, it's very important,
the geographical location
of the genomic data storage solution.
So, the upcoming Swiss data center,

it's a great news for us
and for our Swiss customers.
AWS allowed us to focus on what we do
and took care of everything

about IT infrastructure,
processing, bandwidth,

so that we could build the best
solution for our customers.
(upbeat music)
